EquityZen | New York, NY, USA | Full-Time | Onsite | https://equityzen.com/careers/ EquityZen's mission is to bring private markets to the public. Wealth creation has historically only been accessible by those already wealthy. We have already opened up access to 10,000 times as many folks as before, and are working to put it within reach of a third of the world. We have facilitated 6,000+ private placements in 100+ mature, pre-IPO companies (with company approval), our platform services employees, HNWIs, and hedge funds from ~50 countries. We're looking to double our engineering team to 12 people and are hiring for the following roles. Please don't hesitate to reach out if I can provide any other information about the company, culture and/or roles.

- Senior Front End Engineer (React/ES6/TypeScript): https://equityzen.com/careers/?senior-front-end-engineer

This role will bootstrap the front-end function as a key contributor and will set the standards for quality, style and performance.

- Full Stack Engineers (Python/Django/React): https://equityzen.com/careers/?full-stack-engineer

This is an early/mid-level individual contributor role to help us build out our Python/Django API/Back End using GraphQL and Django REST Framework. This role will also work with the front end team to build out the React-based UI.
